solution.text:
Given pair of equations are:
_{i}_x + ky = _{{7*i}}_ and _{j}_x + _{i}_y = _{{2*j}}_.
_{i}_x + ky - _{{7*i}}_ = 0 -------(1)
_{j}_x + _{i}_y - _{{2*j}}_ = 0 -------(2)
Comparing with general equations, we get:
\(a_1 = _{i}_ ,a_2 = _{j}_ ,b_1 = k ,b_2 = _{i}_ ,c_1 = -_{{7*i}}_, c_2 = -_{{2*j}}_\)
For no solution following is the criteria:
i.e., \({a_1\over a_2} = {b_1\over b_2} \neq {c_1\over c_2}\)
i.e., \({_{i}_\over _{j}_} = {k\over _{i}_} \neq {_{{7*i}}_\over _{{2*j}}_}\)
i.e., \({_{i}_\over _{j}_} = {k\over _{i}_}\)
i.e., \(k = {_{{i*i}}_\over _{j}_}\)

content.text:
Find the value of k for which following pair of equation has no solution.
_{i}_x + ky = _{{7*i}}_ and _{j}_x + _{i}_y = _{{2*j}}_.
